resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

1. What is MakeApp Your Mind?
\ MakeApp Your Mind is an app that was created to help you make day to day decisions. You don’t know what to wear? We’ve got you covered! You don’t know what to eat? We’ve got you covered! Whatever decision you need to make, we’ve got you covered. MakeApp Your Mind will help you make up your mind!

\
2. Who can use the app?
\ Absolutely anyone!

\ 3. Why do I need to turn on location services?
\ Location services are needed to give you appropriate suggestion based on your location.

\ 4. How do I enable location services?
\ Go to the side menu bar>Account Settings>Location Services, turn the location services on.

\ 5. I have dietary restrictions, does MakeApp Your Mind put these into consideration when helping me make a decision?

 You have need to worry, when you create your account you create a user profile where you can enter any dietary restrictions you may have. You can edit these dietary restrictions at any time by going to your account settings, located in the side menu bar.
